Package Model

Class MyDate

java.lang.Object
Model.MyDate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MyDate extends Object implements Serializable
MyDate is a class that represents a date and time
See Also:

    • isBefore

      public boolean isBefore(MyDate date2)
      If the year is less than the year of the other date, return true. If the year is the same, but the month is less, return true. If the year and month are the same, but the day is less, return true. Otherwise, return false
      Parameters:
      date2 - The date to compare to.
      Returns:
      A boolean value.
